column5: Buster Did you happen to catch the news tonight? The Union says they have given all they can,have done all they can, to help the issue.  NOT  I read today that the Ford biggies have sold off thier jets aswell to save cash. Whoop de do. Hell they even held a buffet for the ones that were losing thier jobs. JOKE   Ok I digress.

Here's why the US/Canada market can never survive... no matter what the bail out. Try putting 6 or 7 companies on the plant floor in Oakville... it will never happen North of the Mexican border thanks to the UAW.  http://info.detnews.com/video/index.cfm?id=1189

If their business is worthy of investment then let them earn it in our open market. Make a product that people want to buy at a fair price. The big 3 and the unions screwed us as consumers and when we take our business else where they screw us as taxpayers. A bailout regardless of concessions can never succeed when they are broken beyond repair. This has got to stop.
Looks like a public cry for help.  Nothing like Rich beggers starting to fear monger if they dont get their freebee
